      • runScript

        protected Window runScript(String builderName)
                    throws Exception
        Executes the test script with the specified builder name and returns the main window.
        Parameters:
        builderName - the name of the builder
        Returns:
        the main window
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs

      • fetchController

        protected Object fetchController(String builderName,
                                 Class<?> expectedClass)
                          throws Exception
        Executes the test script with the specified builder name and obtains the window controller. The controller's class is checked.
        Parameters:
        builderName - the name of the builder
        expectedClass - the expected class of the controller
        Returns:
        the controller
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs

      • fetchController

        protected TestWindowControllerTag.WindowController fetchController(String builderName)
                                                            throws Exception
        A convenience method for obtaining a window's controller if it is of type WindowController. Calls the overloaded method with corresponding arguments.
        Parameters:
        builderName - the name of the builder
        Returns:
        the controller
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs
